ValidationRule.description: 32656391 - Users are not able to edit the Meeting Not Held checkbox after they set it to True.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Meeting_Not_Held__c), Meeting_Not_Held__c != True, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Sales Enablement" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit the Meeting Not Held checkbox after it has been checked.
